verses.roman:
rāmānandera bhāi gopīnātha-mahāśaya
tomā haite viṣaya-vāñchā, tāra icchā naya

synonyms: rāmānandera—of Rāmānanda; bhāi—brother; gopīnātha—Gopīnātha Paṭṭanāyaka; mahāśaya—a great gentleman; tomā haite—from You; viṣaya-vāñchā—desire for material advantage; tāra icchā—his desire; naya—is not.
translation: "Gopīnātha Paṭṭanāyaka is a good gentleman. He does not desire material benefits from You.
